column3:
“This strain is such an amazing sleep aid! It makes you feel like you are crawling into a grilled cheese bed of warm gooey cheesy sheets of goodness with toasty bread blankets. Then 9 hours later you awake from what feels like hibernation perfectly rested with zero haziness. 

I am all but non functional within 20 minutes of smoking one bowl so be prepared for bed when you enjoy some Scooby snacks!”

“This strain made me Throw Up... My arms in the air !!!:)

It's FUCKING GOOD.

If Trump smoked this strain he would stop being a asshole and claim he Invented it!! :D”

“I consider myself a VETERAN smoker, I drive, ride bikes, whatevs...but this shit is HEAVY!  Do NOT OPERATE A MOTOR VEHICLE OR HEAVY EQUIPMENT on this medicine!  After all, its hard to drive when you're wrapped in a gooey melted Cheese sandwich. 😂”

“I've already reviewed this strain but I just picked some up again. The taste and smell gets me every time. Out of the 3 strains I picked up  (the white, skunk #1 and scooby snacks) this one is the clear winner. Everyone says a well balanced hybrid" when reviewing strains and I usually don't feel the same way when I try them myself. I would say this actually fits that description for me. This is definitely my go to s...”"

“Strain: Scooby Snacks (Heavy Indica leaning Hybrid)
THC: 23.9%
CBD: 0.2%
Grower: PigFarm
Location found: Natural Wonders
Date purchased: 1.28.16 
Price: $40.00 (with $5.00 off) == $35.00 for an ⅛ Nitro canned sealed
Weight: 3.5g
Method of Consumption: Herb Iron and small bong 
Smell: Reminded me of coffee immediately. The second intense inhale was almost a sweet and spicy licorice smell. 
Look: The buds remind me of ...”
“very good strain nice and relaxing . makes me want to play games all day lol.”

“This strain will have you acting like Shaggy and talking like Scooby Doo. The mysterious thing is how the hell did it get its name? The nugs I had were small but frosty and pungent. At the time I didn't know that it was a platinum GSC cross but I did take note of the GSC smell it had. The effect was hard hitting at first, but eventually it mellowed out very pleasantly. The taste reminded me of Bubba Kush. The feeling...”

“These super dank medium-small sized little green clouds are so tasty to smoke; I'd love to vape some if I could. Maybe even roll one up. They taste/feel and smell great! I feel like I could hold my own blazin up with Shaggy. Know what I mean? This strain is everything you want it to be, very versatile.”

“This is the best strain that I have found to treat my Ménière’s disease. After using Scooby snacks for a month the tinnitus in my left ear is significantly lower. Obviously, this stuff has some serious anti-inflammatory properties. Strangely enough though, Purple Train Wreck is still better for treating Crohn’s disease in my opinion. I imagine Scooby Snacks would be useful for treating joint pain as well. As for the ...”
“Scooby Snacks is fire! It tastes sweet and piney with hints of chocolate when vaped.   It has a excellent mind and body effects. Very stoney and one of my favorites!”
“If I wasn’t so stoned I would for sure get up right now and solve mysteries 👌🏻”
“Nice and mellow. Should have higher euphoria rating. I would name it Office Space for the relaxed
column4: I don't give a damn" effect.”"

column3: “It's hard and heavy, but smooth. A good wind down strain, but I do not recommend operating a motor vehicle.  Highly recommend.”
“Ya know, I love PGSC and all, but this hybrid is not for me. Too much sativa, not the indica I expected, I would says very hybrid. .”
“Amazing aroma. Taste is really smooth. After 5-10 mins starting to get a nice building high and the slow indicia side hits you. Nice for pain, sleep aid and hunger”
“Love this strain! Great for pain,muscle spasms,sleep if you're looking for that. But I like to use as day time medication as it gets me motivated.”
“great citrus smell and smooth draw with a mild and easy comfort over all. no paranoia which is sometimes a concern... just an easy going comfort and focus. I like it”

“The pinnacle of my recreational can his hunting thus far in Portland. The first thing that caught my eye was the beautiful fluorescent green matched with abundance of crystal white trichomes. The smell is fruity with a hint of sweet sour diesel. The flower grinded down beautifully and the smoke and flavor was phenomenal. Easy head high with no drowsy come down.”
“One bowl of this and I was ripped...and I smoke a lot. 10/10 would recommend to anyone and everyone!”
“wow. don't use this if you have anything to do”

“Scooby Snacks is a great strain for relaxing after a stressful day at work! After the first bowl, I was already feeling better. This very rarely happens for me, unless I'm coming off a smoke break. So I was pleased. Honestly, I think Leafly has it spot on, in that it brings on stimulating cerebral effects that weigh heavy on your eyes and slowly relax the body". Mine smells good
column4: I pick up sweet pine & lemon. After ...”"

column3: “This strain is one I’ve been waiting for re supply for quite a while now.  It punches all worry and any anxiety square in the face.  Only thing that has come close is Alien Rock Candy.  I seriously need a pound of this gem.”

“Smells like coffee and skunk, and the effects are similar. After smoking one hit, felt a tingling sensation behind my eyes and in my head, and a small smile creeping up my face. My mind feels energized, yet I don't feel stressed, and my body feels relaxed, but I can still focus as long as I'm not learning a brand new task. It makes me feel like dancing, yet I'm also tired. A nice surprise, especially if you're not a ...”
“i highly recommend if your suffering from depression💕 it truly lifts my mood/emotions.”
“Ahhh I just love the name. Scooby snacks is perfect right before bed and to help keep the depression away. I wish this was around more often”
“Just finished smoking on some Scooby snacks it is 🔥 also the staff is great ppl really helpful Johnnie Caleb keep up the good work”

“Scooby Snacks is a great strain for relaxing after a stressful day at work! After the first bowl, I was already feeling better. This very rarely happens for me, unless I'm coming off a smoke break. So I was pleased. Honestly, I think Leafly has it spot on, in that it brings on stimulating cerebral effects that weigh heavy on your eyes and slowly relax the body". Mine smells good
column4: I pick up sweet pine & lemon. After ...”"

column3: “i was told before they put the strain info on here that scooby snacks is a dawgwalker og x girl scout cookie hybrid????? where did face off og come from??? My favorite strain tho....”
“great citrus smell and smooth draw with a mild and easy comfort over all. no paranoia which is sometimes a concern... just an easy going comfort and focus. I like it”
“Some good flower”
“wow. don't use this if you have anything to do”
“One bowl of this and I was ripped...and I smoke a lot. 10/10 would recommend to anyone and everyone!”
“One bowl of this and I was ripped...and I smoke a lot. 10/10 would recommend to anyone and everyone!”
“Just finished smoking on some Scooby snacks it is 🔥 also the staff is great ppl really helpful Johnnie Caleb keep up the good work”

“So yummy... almost like a cherry pipe tobacco flavor... really enjoyed it. I didn't find it unusually harsh on the throat, but then again I cough with most strains anyway. The high was nice, relaxed but mentally engaging... would have preferred having something planned to watch or do, because I found myself lazy and antsy at the same time.”
“I just have one word scooby-doo by-doo”

“Great name!  This strain looks amazing and delivers just as promised.  A heavy hitter to the head with a heavy feeling in the face and eyes.  Also relaxing and happy feeling, good for chilling late night or most certainly used a sleeping aid.  A cone of scooby snacks and you'll be on cloud 9 in no time.”

“The description is on point for effects ON POINT G  .... the look I got wasn't purple it was green but looked like cookies and frosty dense sorta stickyish.....  guy at the shop said no platinum tho ....  still helped me and my girl rock in bed.”
“Very true to the description!! A pleasure to smoke, with a unique terpene profile”
“great taste!”
“One of my favorites. It gives me plenty of story's to tell. A good story is a time I broke my diet to eat a hole box of donuts, allot of pizza, and a half a bottle of grape vodka.🍩🍕🍇”
“definitely close to being a favorite of mine. tastes great and a overall great high felt very happy and content just a chill relaxing high with moderate to strong effects”
“Heavy and sedative.  But clean.”

“Scooby snacks are a culinary masterpiece. And the cerebral high never lets me down. Just mellows me into a soothing body high. Even its name brings to mind the stoner classic Scooby Doo. Shaggy & Scooby: two potheads that always got the munchies.. And this strain can do it. Kind of couch potato stuf. Tastes so G00D though. This kind I got lends a lot of its taste from the Platinum GSC side of the family. Its sweet ta...”
“Very good flower”

“First strain review:). This has an amazing and lasting high.  It is great for depression and relaxation.  It also keeps you focused on whats going on.  For the who wish to maintain their privacy about smoking due to the bad stereotypes, it is amazing to smoke and your family and friends coming by would never know.  Start with a little and work your way up.  This strains high lasts about 2 hours when smoked and as an ...”
“Dis strain is str8 kill.. Taste the Og every hit and the sweet after taste..I would most def recommend this to anybody ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️”
“This is probably the best strain I’ve tried yet, it did everything it said it’s suppose to do. Hell im starting to talk like Scooby doo & Iike think there’s a monster right behind me... 🙈🏃🏼‍♂️🚀🤯”

Start with a little and work your way up.  This strains high lasts about 2 hours when smoked and as an ...”

“this strain is pretty great i was medicated for hours”
“Dis strain is str8 kill.. Taste the Og every hit and the sweet after taste..I would most def recommend this to anybody ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️”

“This is probably the best strain I’ve tried yet, it did everything it said it’s suppose to do. Hell im starting to talk like Scooby doo & Iike think there’s a monster right behind me... 🙈🏃🏼‍♂️🚀🤯”

“I love me some Scooby Snacks.  Great, classic taste and completely uplifting, yet mellowing out effects.  Nice after work/evening strain.  I certainly don't want to go run a 10k on this, but it helps me relax better than most others, and doesn't leave my mind too  insular.”
“Great sleep aid but if you use it another time of the day it puts you straight to sleep!”
“It was good, it's always at this dispensary and the staff is always nice and helpful.”

“I love me some Scooby Snacks.  Great, classic taste and completely uplifting, yet mellowing out effects.  Nice after work/evening strain.  I certainly don't want to go run a 10k on this, but it helps me relax better than most others, and doesn't leave my mind too  insular.”
“Love the Scooby snacks really uplifting and happy happy”
“Good strain, good genetics, good feeling”
“nice a bit higher cbd love it.as well as decent aroma and flavor”
“Relaxing”
“A relaxing evening and can create some sleepiness if you allow yourself to be inactive.”
“indica dominant ,really good for joint n muscle pain, shatter is potent love it”
“pleasant high. sometimes gives me a headache.  It's great for fun conversations with your friends.”
“As of right now. This is my favorite. Thumbs up. 👍👍👌👌”
“Dog Walker OG x Girl Scout Cookies is the lineage of Scooby Snacks”

“What can I say but WOW!!!  I've been using this amazing strain as my good night" treat for a week and Scooby will have to get his own ... this is my snack now.  With a lineage like Scooby Snacks has no wonder it's so perfect for bedtime.”"
“This is some good shit.”
“If you want to feel better, relaxed and still be able to function, this is a what you want!”
“Dopest dope I ever smoked, really this strain is truly amazing.”
“Dog Walker OG x Girl Scout Cookies is the lineage of Scooby Snacks”
“Here is a strain that really gives you an uplift. Smoked out of bong with rockstar in it, not a bad effect ! Now I'm floating and glad I bought it .. Good blend”

“West county sun grown, indica > sativa 
(Platinum g.s.c x face off OG) 
For afternoon soothing use as a head up body down high 
Worked just as advertised atta 19.6% thc”

“Tried some of this for the first time a few years back and thought it was ok/decent. I've smoked it here and there in the last few years. 

Just picked up a little today since I was looking for something different from what I've been smoking lately. This time round though who ever grew it did a great job. I really like strains that have a piney taste and have to say this is some really tasty stuff. High is suprr nice...”
“I asked for a indica complex with CBDs" in Olympia
column4: Wa. Got "Scooby" by Doc Croc... Darn Right. I call THAT a knife...”"

column3: “looks great,smells better than great tastes phenomenal. very smooth chil high. I think I have to say it's my new favorite for a while”
“One of my favorite indicas”
“I really like the effects of this strain”
“Just Picked Some Up It's Okay The Obama Kush Stats Lacked But Looked Like The Bes Bud In Puff Oregon I Would Also Like To See Puff Oregon Sell Shatter Recreationaly”
“it was very tasty hit quick the description doesn't lie it's a pretty good chill at home smoke and nap or relax”

“From bag appeal to smell taste and effect this strain for me was 5 stars .  Some of the most potent medicine I've had in a long time! Super skunky smell great taste  very relaxed body but had a nice little cerebral buzz . amazing nights sleep . a little goes a long way!”
“Rough for smoking, but excellent at getting the end goal achieved. From a season bong user, this specific strain led to a lot of dry coughing, and it felt harsher than what I'm used to”
“Scooby snack was great, I went back for more immediately as it helped with pain and sleeping!”
“My favorite hybrid lately.. Mellows me out and helps with my insomnia. Would recommend saving this one for an evening at home because it's a heavy hitter.”
“I love how they combine them all. It is a good high every time!”
“It's very good”
“Very good flower”
“Love the Scooby snacks really uplifting and happy happy”

“Scooby Snacks is a pretty potent strain with good flavor, aroma, and appearance. The flowers are a fluffy, sappy, pungent green with a tremendous amount of crystal trichomes coating the buds. The parent strains to Scooby Snacks are extremely potent strains that give it a nice kick. The flavor is very pleasant that is not harsh at all. A nice skunk/flowery aroma with the same in the flavor with maybe a tad of pepper/s...”
“This is probably the best strain I’ve tried yet, it did everything it said it’s suppose to do. Hell im starting to talk like Scooby doo & Iike think there’s a monster right behind me... 🙈🏃🏼‍♂️🚀🤯”

“This strain is really awesome if you have a hard time sleeping. Relaxed, happy, sleepy. Appearance and taste is pretty much gsc, with a small lemon-pine og hint to it. Honestly if someone told me it was gsc I would believe them, there’s not really a clear og taste or smell, you’d probably taste it more in some oil rather than in some flower. Solid hybrid though, more indica I’d say. I’ll buy it again cause the name i...”
“Relaxing”

“A fun, giddy come on that’s strong and noticeable, yet overshadowed by what feels like a weight on top that’s almost bending me over. That may just be how the distant mental state is interpreting the physically relaxing aspect of the high. It’s not bad, just pretty distracting. Learning to gel with and embrace it. Despite how gone and distant everything feels (like your brain’s wrapped in a thick sweater), it has a c...”
“Killer strain. I am currently looking for clones of this particular strain so if anyone has info please lmk. thanks”

“Whoever named this strain is a jackass, Scooby Snacks" are little pieces of weed and ash you get in your mouth while smoking out of a pipe. I mean sure that's a great name for a strain...if the term wasn't already taken”"
